metrics_conclusion: Flowers and Balloons has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Flowers and Balloons has sections analyzed in the following keys: B♭ Major, B♭ Minor, G Minor,  and G Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
